fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Drain one person of their ability every night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- To drain a player you must guess their subalignment (Investigative, Support etc.)
- A drained player will be roleblocked until the night Fae guesses wrong or fails to submit an action. The player will not be roleblocked on the night the action fails. They receive the default roleblock feedback every night they are drained.
- If the fae targets a non-town role, they will be told their target is not what they may seem. The target will not be drained and no drained players will be roleblocked this night, however they will stay drained.
- You cannot target an already drained player or someone you know not to be town.
- You cannot be roleblocked or redirected.
- Your visits are astral.
- You have a one-time Basic autovest.
- Your creator is Story to the (6) Investicreator.
